prompt: A whimsical and fantastical scene of a Nebula Garden located in a remote part of the universe. The garden is filled with vibrant, glowing flowers amidst swirling cosmic dust and tiny stars. Magical creatures resembling glowing jellyfish float peacefully among the floral blooms. The stars and nebulae form a beautiful, tranquil backdrop, all under the soft, shimmering light of distant galaxies in the dark, ethereal sky. Full art image with bright, ethereal visuals and a focus on cosmic elements, no text.
